markdown:
| icon           = poe2 armor_invoice icon.png
| description    = Ogne, of the Partisans of the Lighted Path, had been carrying these documents on her person.

One page appears to be a ship's itinerary, with a list of ports and dates. Hasongo and Neketaka are the last two ports listed. If the dates are correct, the ship would most recently have arrived in Neketaka. However, the itinerary does not specify a departure date for that entry - there is no telling if the ship has left port yet.

The second page is a list of names. "Bearn" does appear on it, about halfway down, with no surname listed.

There is also a cargo list, noting which cargo is to be picked up at each port. Food and drink account for most of the items being loaded at Neketaka, but one item stands apart as having no obvious place among the rest: "Venom, Aedyran Tree Viper." Its quantity is listed in terms of "phials," and calls for several dozen.

Finally, there is a map that appears to have charted places where Eothas has been sighted in the islands. A line has been drawn that connects the points. It projects a course northward beyond his most recent appearance, and a point along that trajectory has been marked with an 'x.'
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Quest item
| item_category  = Other item
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = 
| value          = 0
| range          = 
| level1_spells  = 
| level2_spells  = 
| level3_spells  = 
| level4_spells  = 
| level5_spells  =
| level6_spells  = 
| level7_spells  = 
| level8_spells  = 
| item_bonuses   = 
| enchantments   = 
| rel_quests     = The Lighted Path
| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = ITEM_QUEST_Eder_Ogne_Note
| location       = * Dropped by [Ogne](/ogne/) if she is killed, or during the encounter with her after leaving the [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/) (assuming you failed the check to get information as to how you might join the Vanguard).
| guid           = 59422a15-a9c0-467e-a7d1-f48ac833a43d
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Reveals that the [Partisans of the Lighted Path](/partisansOfTheLightedPath/) intend to commit mass suicide in the presence of [Eothas](/eothas/), and that their ship is due to leave port in [Neketaka](/neketaka/).

One page appears to be a ship's itinerary, with a list of ports and dates. Hasongo and Neketaka are the last two ports listed. If the dates are correct, the ship would most recently have arrived in Neketaka. However, the itinerary does not specify a departure date for that entry - there is no telling if the ship has left port yet.

The second page is a list of names. "Bearn" does appear on it, about halfway down, with no surname listed.

There is also a cargo list, noting which cargo is to be picked up at each port. Food and drink account for most of the items being loaded at Neketaka, but one item stands apart as having no obvious place among the rest: "Venom, Aedyran Tree Viper." Its quantity is listed in terms of "phials," and calls for several dozen.

Finally, there is a map that appears to have charted places where Eothas has been sighted in the islands. A line has been drawn that connects the points. It projects a course northward beyond his most recent appearance, and a point along that trajectory has been marked with an 'x.'
